entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
